data.title: Obituary for Jerry Roberts
data.meta_description: Obituary for Jerry Dale Roberts | Jerry Dale Roberts was born November 30, 1942, in Lawton, Oklahoma to Bernard and Gladys Perilla Roberts. He passed away on January 21, 2020, at his home in Apache at the age of 77.A...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Jerry Roberts | January 21, 2020 | Whitt Funeral Home
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
